skill.name: video-downloader
skill.description: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing, editing, or archival. Handles various formats and quality options.
skill.summary: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing, editing, or archival. Handles various formats.
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Static scanner flagged patterns were evaluated as false positives. The skill is a legitimate video downloader utility. Network access and external commands are required for core functionality (downloading videos from URLs). All flagged patterns were misidentified: MP4/MP3 format strings were flagged as weak crypto, markdown code blocks were flagged as shell execution, and YouTube URLs were flagged as suspicious hardcoded URLs.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to save online videos for offline access. This skill downloads YouTube videos and other platform content in multiple formats and quality options for offline viewing, editing, or archival.
actual_capabilities: Download videos from YouTube and supported platforms
limitations: Quality depends on source video availability
May not work with age-restricted or private videos
Requires compatible download tools to be installed

use_cases.title: Save Educational Content
use_cases.description: Download tutorials, courses, and educational videos for offline learning when internet is unavailable.

use_cases.title: Archive Important Videos
use_cases.description: Create personal backups of videos that may be removed or made unavailable in the future.

use_cases.title: Extract Audio for Podcasts
use_cases.description: Download video content and extract audio tracks for listening to podcasts and music offline.

prompt_templates.title: Quality-Specified Download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download this video in 1080p quality: https://youtube.com/watch?v=...

prompt_templates.title: Audio Extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the audio from this YouTube video as MP3: https://youtube.com/watch?v=...

prompt_templates.title: Playlist Download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download all videos from this YouTube playlist: [playlist_url]

output: Video: "How to Build Products Users Love"

output_examples.input: Download the audio from this YouTube video as MP3

best_practices: Specify quality settings to manage file sizes on slow connections
Use dedicated folders to organize downloads by topic or date
Check file size estimates before starting large batch downloads
anti_patterns: Don't download copyrighted content without permission
Avoid ignoring platform terms of service restrictions
Don't use for unauthorized redistribution of content

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill primarily supports YouTube. Other platform support depends on the underlying download tools available on your system.

faq.question: Can I download entire playlists?
faq.answer: Yes, you can provide a playlist URL and the skill will download all videos from that playlist in sequence.

faq.question: What quality options are available?
faq.answer: You can choose from 480p, 720p, 1080p, and 4K depending on the source video quality. Lower qualities produce smaller files.

faq.question: Can I extract just the audio?
faq.answer: Yes, use the audio-only option to download and convert video audio to MP3 format for offline listening.

faq.question: Where are videos saved?
faq.answer: Videos are saved to your Downloads folder by default. You can specify a different destination path.

faq.question: Is this skill legal to use?
faq.answer: Use responsibly. Only download content you have rights to access. Respect copyright and platform terms of service.
